jobTitle: Senior Reporting Accountant - Up to $120k + 10% bonus
description:
Our client is a national leader in the oversight of and production services for entertainment studios and media production sites worldwide. They are extremely acquisitive and looking for a senior reporting accountant to join their team.

Essential Functions:
  • Fiscal oversight of international entities to ensure reporting consistency, proper controllership review and adherence to contractual obligations.
  • Assist with M&A integration activities including technical accounting issues, tax consequence identification and financial reporting.
  • Ensure global cash flow statements are prepared in accordance with GAAP and assist with associated cash flow and distribution forecasting.
  • Support interim and YE external audit process including writing first comprehensive draft of year-end financial statements with footnotes.
  • Perform monthly detailed analysis of subsidiaries performance including variance explanations.
  • Provide standard and ad-hoc analyses as needed, including balance sheet reconciliations, annual impairment testing analysis, and assist in M&A transactions (including post acquisition integration).
Required Education and Experience:
  • Big 4 experience, CPA required
  • Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, or related field of study.
  • Experience preparing and/or reviewing financial statements.
  • Strong work ethic with a commitment to excellence and integrity.
  • Able to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, to adapt quickly and to manage changing priorities.
  • Strong commitment to meet deadlines and take on special projects.
  • Prior experience with M&A and complex reporting matters is a plus
